member.name: T:FM.LiveSwitch.Yuv.FilterMode
member.summary: A filter mode.

member.name: P:FM.LiveSwitch.Yuv.FilterMode.None
member.summary: Gets the value indicating no filter (point sample). This is the fastest option, but produces the lowest quality.

member.name: P:FM.LiveSwitch.Yuv.FilterMode.Linear
member.summary: Gets the value indicating linear (horizontal only). This is faster than bilinear, but produces lower quality.

member.name: P:FM.LiveSwitch.Yuv.FilterMode.Bilinear
member.summary: Gets the value indicating bilinear. This is faster than box, but produces lower quality.

member.name: P:FM.LiveSwitch.Yuv.FilterMode.Box
member.summary: Gets the value indicating box. This is the slowest option, but produces the highest quality.
